blogPost.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.body: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.title: Online teambuilding by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building games for small and large companies
blogPost.author: David Sipos

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型和大型公司的网络托管团队建设游戏。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型和大型公司的網絡託管團隊建設遊戲。

previous.excerpt: CS.code.in is a hardcore, intensive, and absolutely immersive computer engineering track with all the right ingredients of your BS+MS college programs, minus the years and hundreds of thousands of dollars.
previous.title: The CS Code Program - Become a Computer Science Engineer in 12 months.

localize.description: CS.code.in是一个硬核的，密集的，绝对沉浸式的计算机工程轨道，具有BS+MS大学课程的所有正确成分，减去年限和数十万美元。
localize.tagline: 在12个月内成为一名计算机科学工程师。

localize.description: CS.code.in是一個硬核的，密集的，絕對沉浸式的計算機工程軌道，具有BS+MS大學課程的所有正確成分，減去年限和數十萬美元。
localize.tagline: 在12個月內成爲一名計算機科學工程師。

next.excerpt: Everything a senior needs in a single place. 70% of seniors are now online, but most of them still struggle to use the internet to its full potential. Urizen allows seniors to keep up with the pace and stay on top of their game.
next.title: Urizen - A simpler Google for seniors

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一个地方。现在70%的老年人都在上网，但他们中的大多数人仍然难以充分发挥互联网的潜力。Urizen可以让老年人跟上步伐，保持在游戏的顶端。
localize.tagline: 为老年人提供更简单的谷歌

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一個地方。現在70%的老年人都在上網，但他們中的大多數人仍然難以充分發揮互聯網的潛力。Urizen可以讓老年人跟上步伐，保持在遊戲的頂端。
localize.tagline: 爲老年人提供更簡單的谷歌
